tour.title: Welcome to asyncz
tour.content: This quick tour helps experts understand the sections they can access on asyncz.

tour.title: Main Navigation
tour.content: Use the header to move between the areas available to you.

tour.title: Dashboard
tour.content: See an overview of your bookings and basic account details here.

tour.title: Calendar
tour.content: View and manage only the events assigned to you in the calendar.

tour.title: Services
tour.content: Check the services you are allowed to provide and keep them updated if needed.

tour.title: Customers
tour.content: Access the customer list related to your bookings and review basic details.

tour.title: Feedback & Support
tour.content: If you notice issues or have ideas, send feedback or reach support here.
